name: ibf
description: invertible bloom filter using typed arrays
author: Kyle E. Mitchell <kyle@kemitchell.com> (https://kemitchell.com/)

scripts.precoverage: defence README.md | replace-require-self > test.js && istanbul cover -- test.js ; rm -f test.js
scripts.test: defence README.md | replace-require-self | node && echo 'All tests passed.'
scripts.lint: npm run lint:code && npm run lint:readme
